message.entry: Only Dashboard blocks can be promoted to a panel. Other elements in selection left unchanged.
Panels created in a model hierarchy are associated with and saved in the top model.
Blocks in referenced models cannot be promoted to a panel.
Unable to move panel element into referenced model. Dashboard blocks cannot connect across model reference boundaries.
Panel elements can only be moved to another panel or an editable Simulink canvas.
Blocks in referenced models cannot be promoted to a panel.
Block not yet ready. Please try again.
Deleting a panel deletes the panel and its contents from the model.\nAre you sure you want to delete this panel?
Are you sure you want to delete this block?
Cannot change the model {0} while the simulation is running
Image must be a SVG, PNG, JPG, BMP, TIFF, or GIF file.
Image dimensions must be greater than zero.
Unable to load image file. Try loading the file again.
To copy a panel into another model, the model you copy from must be open.
Unable to rotate block because the rotated block does not fit inside current panel dimensions. To rotate the block, edit the panel so it is big enough to contain the rotated block.
To rotate, resize, or reposition a block in a panel, enter edit mode.
Cannot open a panel containing a Dashboard Scope block in a new window during simulation.
Add one or more blocks to a panel to create a dashboard of controls and displays you can use throughout a model hierarchy.
Collecting all binding information for the Panel blocks
Preparing model data for the application
Failed to create dashboard panel app!
To verify if you need to install MATLAB Runtime, refer to the Readme.txt.
Folder for dependencies was specified but could not be found.
Invalid deployment folder. Folder should be writeable.
Unable to deploy panel because it contains Dashboard Scope blocks.
Save model before trying to deploy panel.
App name ''{0}'' is invalid. App name must return 1 when passed to the isvarname function.
Unable to deploy an empty panel.
Unable to deploy panel because it contains Callback Button blocks.
To proceed with deployment, save and close all app designer windows.
Unable to deploy panel because one or more dashboard block connections are broken.
Deployment to the MATLAB installation directory is not supported. Change the deployment output folder. If you did not specify an output folder, the output folder is the current folder.
Output folder does not exist. Please specify an existing folder.
Deployment canceled due to missing or unresolved model dependencies.
Copying these model files for deployment:
Unable to find these files referenced by the model:
Unable to package some files referenced by the model. See Diagnostic Viewer for details. Do you want to continue?
Unable to package these files because of file path:
Add the files to the MATLAB path or move them into the folder that contains the model.
Folder with the same name as the app found in the current directory. Remove the folder or cancel deployment?
